comments.raw_text:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #518343 +++

The in-memory and on-disk caches should both be cleared of all OCSP responses except "revoked." The error page for cert revocation should be modified to indicate that, in private browsing mode or when clearing recent history, revocation information will not be cleared. That is, we would be trading safety for privacy in this specific case. Agreed?
